Text:
For updating game to v1.20 which the dlc requires 

Download this app on pc - http://www.aldostools.org/ps3gameupdates.rar

1.Put the title id in search bar of application e.g- BLUS31010
2.on extreme right make sure to select CFW - 4.30
3.Click verify
4.Latest update will be shown , download.
5.Put it on a pendrive and install the pkg , simple as that
BTW patch 1.20 size is 540.2Mb
